query:
INSERT INTO blog_posts (title, slug, content, excerpt, authorId, category, tags, featured, published, createdAt) VALUES
('How to Identify Real Factories vs Trading Companies in China', 'how-to-identify-real-factories', 'Learn the key differences between real factories and trading companies. Discover red flags and green flags that will help you make the right decision.', 'Learn the key differences between real factories and trading companies.', 1, 'Supplier Verification', '["factories", "trading", "verification", "china"]', 1, 1, NOW()),
('Top 10 Supplier Verification Tips That Save Money', 'top-10-supplier-verification-tips', 'Discover the most effective strategies used by professional sourcing agents to verify suppliers and avoid costly mistakes.', 'Discover the most effective strategies used by professional sourcing agents.', 1, 'Tips & Tricks', '["verification", "tips", "suppliers", "sourcing"]', 1, 1, NOW()),
('Red Flags That Indicate a Scam Supplier - Protect Your Investment', 'red-flags-scam-supplier', 'Learn how to identify warning signs of fraudulent suppliers before losing money. This comprehensive guide covers common scams and how to avoid them.', 'Learn how to identify warning signs of fraudulent suppliers.', 1, 'Supplier Verification', '["fraud", "scams", "protection", "verification"]', 0, 1, NOW()),
('Secure Payment Methods for Importing from China - Protect Your Money', 'secure-payment-methods-china', 'Discover the safest payment methods when buying from Chinese suppliers. Learn about escrow, trade assurance, and payment protection strategies.', 'Discover the safest payment methods when buying from Chinese suppliers.', 1, 'Payment & Finance', '["payment", "security", "escrow", "finance"]', 1, 1, NOW()),
('Complete Guide to Shipping from China - Methods, Costs, and Timeline', 'complete-guide-shipping-china', 'Master the shipping process from Chinese factories. Learn about different shipping methods, costs, timelines, and how to track your shipment.', 'Master the shipping process from Chinese factories.', 1, 'Shipping & Logistics', '["shipping", "logistics", "costs", "tracking"]', 1, 1, NOW()),
('Quality Control Checklist for Factory Inspections', 'quality-control-checklist', 'A comprehensive checklist for inspecting factories and ensuring product quality. Learn what to look for and how to evaluate manufacturing standards.', 'A comprehensive checklist for inspecting factories.', 1, 'Quality Assurance', '["quality", "inspection", "checklist", "standards"]', 0, 1, NOW()),
('How to Negotiate Better Prices with Chinese Suppliers', 'negotiate-better-prices', 'Master the art of negotiation with Chinese suppliers. Learn strategies to get better prices without compromising on quality.', 'Master the art of negotiation with Chinese suppliers.', 1, 'Tips & Tricks', '["negotiation", "pricing", "strategy", "suppliers"]', 0, 1, NOW()),
('Building Long-Term Relationships with Suppliers', 'building-supplier-relationships', 'Learn how to establish trust and build long-term partnerships with your suppliers for mutual growth and success.', 'Learn how to establish trust and build long-term partnerships.', 1, 'Business Strategy', '["relationships", "partnership", "trust", "business"]', 0, 1, NOW());
